titleStmt.title: Joyfull nevves from Nevvcastle. Being a true relation of the proceedings, of the Right Honourable the Earle of Pembroke, and the rest of the Commissioners with the Kings most excellent Majestie at Newcastle. Also, the proceedings of the Scottish Commissioners, and their delivery of the King to the Parliament of England, accompanied by the Lord Lowdon, and the Lord Belcarris, towards his princely throne at London.

Joyfull nevves from Nevvcastle. Being a true relation of the proceedings, of the Right Honourable the Earle of Pembroke, and the rest of the Commissioners with the Kings most excellent Majestie at Newcastle. Also, the proceedings of the Scottish Commissioners, and their delivery of the King to the Parliament of England, accompanied by the Lord Lowdon, and the Lord Belcarris, towards his princely throne at London.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
